title: Drawing, "Temperance", 1816
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Elephant drinks from bowl which putto holds for him.  In front, woman sits with palm leaf and bridle on stool. Beside her kneels putto.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Temperance", 1816.
1816. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3244.
